title: Lonepine Wolf Shifters
description: Ronan James and his sister Molly are one the run. They are fleeing Assistant District Attorney Jordan Randall, who is hell-bent on dragging Ronan back to Michigan for a crime he didn't commit. They find themselves stranded on a country back road in rural Montana and are unwittingly rescued by an auto mechanic, who happens to be the Beta of the Lonepine pack of Wolf Shifters. Soon they find themselves under the protection of the Pack due to the fact that Ronan is the mate of the Alpha Lance Hendricks. All seems well at first, but Jordan Randall is not a man that gives up easily. Will they find peace or will they forever be hunted
author: B.A. Stretke
